name: SOFAS
description: This sleek, minimalist sofa features clean lines and a contemporary design, making it a perfect addition to any modern living space.

name: CHAIRS
description: The accent chair is a statement piece that adds personality to any room

name: TABLE
description: The  table is the centerpiece of family gatherings and meals. Typically rectangular or round, it offers ample space for dining and entertaining.

name: BED
description: A modern design with a low profile and a sturdy base, often featuring a slatted or solid foundation for mattress support. No box spring is needed.

name: STORAGE
description: TOpen or closed shelves that can hold books, decor, or storage bins. They come in various materials like wood, metal, or plastic.

name: LIGHTING
description: The main source of light in a room, providing overall illumination. Common examples include ceiling fixtures, chandeliers, and recessed lighting.
